title: Attempting to reconnect after ability cast
body: Ping is low and fine all game however when I cast an ability my champ freezes and then it attempts to reconnect.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try running through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article for me, let me know if this helps.
Same thing is happening to me I need some help too :(. I'm with you bro. Rito Plz
